INSTRUCTIONS FOR PAYMENT BY TRNSCASH                    SUPPLEMENT TERMS AND CONDITIONS FOR MAIL ORDERS

Payment can be made by cash at any U.K. Post Office,  1) If items are out of stock, the order will be made up with
using the enclosed TRANSACTION FORM                      similar items or extras of those already ordered,
enclosed with the order.                                 unless there is a list of substitutes

1) Complete the enclosed Transaction form             2) ALL CHINA AND GLASSWARE ARE SENT AT THE BUYERS RISK.
with the TOTAL amount of payment
(including VAT and P&P).                              3) Goods once sold cannot be returned .
2) Ensure the Transcash form is dated and signed and
 that both counter foils have the total amount shown. 4) All prices subject to change without notice and
3) Take the form with the cash to any Post                VAT at the appropriate rate
Office for payment.
4) You will be charged a standard fee for the service.5) All goods offered subject to vailability.
5)The Post Office will stamp both counterfoils as
 confirmation of payment and retain the payment form.
6) Retain one counterfoil for your own record          6) All orders subject to our normal Terms & Conditions
  return the second with the order form.                   (copy available on request).

IMPORTANT: Failure to include a counterfoil            7) All carriage charges (including returns)
 will delay your order.                                     are to be paid for by the buyer.

We will dispatch the goods upon receiving the order form and stamped counterfoil.

PAYMENT BY DEBIT/CREDIT CARD   Please remember there is a £50 minimum on all orders.
